titleStmt.title: Win at first, lose at last: or, A new game at cards: Wherein the King recovered his crown, and traitors lost their heads. To the tune of; Ye gallants take delight to play.
titleStmt.author: L. P. (Laurence Price), fl. 1625-1680?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Fra. Coles, Tho; Vere; Io. VVright and Io. Clarke.,

notesStmt.note: Verse: "You merry hearts that love to play ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
